definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="MCItem" id="stack">stack</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="variables_set_itemstack"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:stack</field><value name="VAL"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">var bar=CustomAPI.getCustomBar(stack);</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="java_code_get"><field name="CODE">bar.numerator==bar.denominator</field></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">bar.visible=false;</field></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">bar.visible=true;</field></block></statement><next><block type="return_logic"><value name="return"><block type="java_code_get"><field name="CODE">bar.numerator==bar.denominator</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
